biography.summary: Mike Lee is an American attorney and politician serving as the senior United States Senator from Utah since 2011. A member of the Republican Party, he is known for conservative constitutionalist positions.
biography.early_life: Born June 4, 1971; raised in Utah; earned a law degree from Brigham Young University.
biography.education: Brigham Young University (B.A.), Brigham Young University J. Reuben Clark Law School (J.D.).
biography.career: Attorney and former Utah state politician; has served as a U.S. Senator since 2011.

contact.office_address: 363 Russell Senate Office Building, Washington DC 20510

committees.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

policy_positions.stance: Supports lower taxes and limited government

timeline.event: Elected to the U.S. Senate from Utah (Class 3)
Started current term as U.S. Senator from Utah
